title: CodeRED Security Update
subtitle: Important information about your alert account
keyMessage: We recommend all CodeRED account holders update their password to help keep your information secure.

why.title: Why am I seeing this?
paragraphs: Out of an abundance of caution, we are recommending that all CodeRED users with an online account update their password. This helps ensure your information remains secure and protected.

noAccount.title: I don't have an account
paragraphs: Some individuals receive alerts through CodeRED without having an online account. If you're one of these legacy users, no immediate action is required.
However, creating an account allows you to review and update your contact information, manage alert preferences, and ensure your information stays current.
